metadata.title: CVE-2023-42282 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in NPM IP Package v.1.1.8 and before allows an attacker to executearbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via the isPublic()function.

criterions.comment: node-ip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
